pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Ex-Aid's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_ex_aid)Gamer Driver (Ex-Aid)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Ex-Aid's $(l:ex_aid/riders/ex-aid#action_2)Action Gamer Level 1/2$(/l)
